llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | EV-unit economics re-accelerate; EBITDA turns positive and ROIC meaningfully exceeds cost of capital | Watch Q2 EV profitability trajectory, EBIT margin, and ROIC evolution | 65% (22PL3Q360)

Up | 3–6 months | Base-case regime remains the most probable path with durable cash generation and dividends despite EV drag | Watch for a sustained cash-flow inflection, dividend sustainability, and any compression/expansion in the forward multiple | 60% (22PL3Q360)(65UUBU0OR)

Down | 0–3 weeks | Yemen escalation risk-off dynamics feeding energy/shipping risk premia; watch for de-escalation signals and shipping disruption indicators | 50% (I2SJU04DF)

Down | 3–6 months | Tariff/policy developments remain an invalidation trigger; unilateral tariffs or sharper downturn compress multiples and raise cost of capital | Watch tariff clarity by Nov 2025 and policy shocks that reprice risk assets | 45% (65UUBU0OR)(22PL3Q360)
